SEARCH
Package management

Class AppointmentManagement

java.lang.Object
management.AppointmentManagement
public class AppointmentManagement extends Object
Provides various methods for managing appointments and handles between the interaction between the user and system This class interacts with AppointmentHandler and StaffHandler for functionality.

    • hasPastAppointment

      public static boolean hasPastAppointment(Patient patient)
      Checks if a given patient has any past appointments with outcomes recorded.
      Parameters:
      patient - the patient whose appointment history is being checked
      Returns:
      true if the patient has past appointments with recorded outcomes, false otherwise
